content:
You push away a thick curtain of vines and notice a softly glowing light. It appears to be coming from a massive, rounded seedpod, covered in a thick, barklike shell. The longer you stare at it, the more it feels like the seed is pulling at your attention, drawing you to study it more closely. You’ve never felt like this before, but you can sense a strange certainty in your mind. If you investigate this seed further, you may be in for quite an endeavor.

Clear the Mysterious Seed with   to understand why you’re being compelled in this way.
